terms.definition: Software that enables users to create, edit, manage, and organize digital content and documentation with collaborative features and multimedia support.
Technical documentation that explains how to use and integrate with an Application Programming Interface, including endpoints, parameters, and examples.
A centralized repository of information, documentation, and resources that provides answers to common questions and solutions to problems.
A system that tracks and manages changes to documents or code over time, allowing users to access previous versions and manage updates.
The ability to combine different types of media content such as text, images, videos, and interactive elements within a single document or platform.
The ability for multiple users to work on the same document simultaneously, seeing changes and updates as they happen instantly.
A text editor that uses Markdown syntax for formatting, allowing users to create structured documents using simple markup language.
Standard Operating Procedure - a detailed written instruction to achieve uniformity in performing specific business functions or processes.
Documentation that can be integrated or embedded into other websites, applications, or platforms while maintaining its functionality and appearance.
JSON Web Token authentication - a secure method of transmitting information between parties as a digitally signed token for user verification.
Role-Based Access Control - a security approach that restricts system access based on the roles of individual users within an organization.
Identity and Access Management - a framework of policies and technologies ensuring that the right users have appropriate access to resources.
The level of interaction, participation, and connection that users have with content, documentation, or a platform.
Any content that exists in digital format, including text, images, videos, and interactive media created for online consumption.
Documentation that follows a consistent format, organization, and hierarchy to make information easily accessible and navigable.
